info.name: ClickNow ‚Äî Milestone 1 (Auth + Onboarding)
info.description:
MILESTONE 1 ONLY

üìå WHO IS THIS FOR:
- Customer (role: client)
- Professional (role: professional)
- NO Admin APIs in this collection

üîë HOW TO USE:
1. Run 'STEP 2 ‚Äî Register' (everyone registers as Customer first)
2. Copy the token from the response ‚Üí set in Collection Variable 'token'
3. CUSTOMER: skip to Customer Flow
4. PROFESSIONAL: complete phone OTP in Professional Flow, then continue onboarding
   The onboarding step auto-upgrades role from client ‚Üí professional

‚ö†Ô∏è NO role field in registration ‚Äî everyone starts as 'client'
‚ö†Ô∏è Role upgrades ONLY happen via POST /professionals (onboarding)
‚ö†Ô∏è Admin can suspend a professional ‚Üí role goes back to 'client'

üìÇ FOLDER STRUCTURE:
- üîì SHARED AUTH ‚Äî Register + Email OTP, Login, Refresh, Logout
- üü¢ CUSTOMER FLOW ‚Äî Profile, Browse, Booking, Reviews
- üîµ PROFESSIONAL FLOW ‚Äî Onboarding Steps ‚Üí Dashboard

‚ö†Ô∏è BASE URL: http://localhost:3000/api/v1

AUTH NOTE:
- Register payload uses fullName (no firstName/lastName).
- Email OTP uses SMTP provider.
- Phone OTP supports provider=firebase or provider=mock for testing.

item.name: üîì SHARED AUTH (No Token Required)
item.description: Public endpoints ‚Äî use these first to register and get your JWT token

item.name: STEP 1A ‚Äî Send OTP (Email Verification for Registration)

request.description:
Registration flow: send OTP to user's email.

Use email + role only (no purpose field).

When email service is integrated, OTP is delivered to email.

MailerSend note: if sending fails with 450/MS42207, verify your sender domain/email and set SMTP_FROM to a verified sender.

item.name: STEP 1B ‚Äî Verify OTP (Email Verification for Registration)

request.description: Registration flow: verify email OTP and receive auth response.

item.name: STEP 2 ‚Äî Register (Everyone ‚Äî Customer OR Future Professional)

request.description:
Registration Screen

ONE REGISTRATION FOR EVERYONE.

After register, backend sends OTP to email (auth/send-otp via email).
Verify email OTP using STEP 1B.

Do not send role at register; user starts as role='client'.
Professional upgrade happens later via POST /professionals onboarding.

Send fullName in registration payload.

üì± Figma Screen: Login Screen

Login with email and password.

Response includes:
- token (JWT access token)
- refreshToken
- user { id, email, role, fullName }

‚úÖ Copy token ‚Üí set in Collection Variable 'token'

üì± Figma Screen: Login Screen ‚Üí 'Sign up with Google' button

Exchange Firebase ID token for app JWT token.
Firebase token is obtained from Google Sign-In on the frontend.

Use refresh token to get a new access token when the current one expires.

JWT access token expires in 15min by default.
Call this when you get 401 AUTH_TOKEN_EXPIRED.
üì± Figma Screen: Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Change Password
Invalidate the current session. Call this when user taps Logout.

item.name: üü¢ CUSTOMER FLOW
item.description:
All APIs used by Customer role (role: client)

üì± Screens Covered:
- Customer Dashboard (Home)
- Portfolio / Browse Professionals
- Service Booking Form
- My Bookings (Upcoming, Completed, Cancelled)
- My Profile
- Settings

request.description:
üì± Figma Screen: My Profile

Returns the customer's full profile.

Role required: client

Response: { fullName, email, phone, avatar, settings, stats: { bookings, spent, ratings } }

üì± Figma Screen: My Profile ‚Üí Edit

Update name, phone, avatar.
üì± Figma Screen: Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Notifications
Call this on app launch after login to register the device for push notifications.

üì± Figma Screen: Customer Dashboard ‚Äî 'Our Leading Services' banner

Returns admin-featured professionals.
No auth required (public).

üì± Figma Screen: Customer Dashboard ‚Äî 'Services At ClickNow' grid

Returns all active service categories (Photographer, DJ, Musician, Anchor, etc.)
Public endpoint ‚Äî no auth required.

üì± Figma Screen: Services At ClickNow ‚Üí tap a category

Replace 'photographer' with: dj | musician | anchor | videographer | cinematographer
üì± Figma Screen: Customer Dashboard ‚Äî recommended professionals

üì± Figma Screen: Service Booking Form (top section ‚Äî professional info)

Returns public profile: name, category, bio, pricing, rating, reviews count, location, specialties.

‚ö†Ô∏è Set professionalId in Collection Variables first.

üì± Figma Screen: Portfolio Screen ‚Üí Media Gallery tabs (All, Photography, Multiday, Wedding)

Returns portfolio images/videos for a professional.

üì± Figma Screen: Portfolio Screen ‚Üí 'Our Client Experiences' section

Returns approved reviews with rating, title, content, reviewer name.

üì± Figma Screen: Service Booking Form ‚Üí Event Date field

Check available time slots for a specific date before booking.

body.raw:
{
  "professionalId": "{{professionalId}}",
  "bookingDate": "2026-03-15",

  "eventDetails": {

  },

  },

}

request.description:
üì± Figma Screen: Service Booking Form ‚Üí 'Submit Request' / 'Book This Service' button

Role required: client

Creates a booking in PENDING status.

‚úÖ After success: Copy booking 'id' from response ‚Üí set in Collection Variable 'bookingId'

üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí 'Upcoming' tab

Role required: client

Returns paginated list of client's bookings filtered by status.
üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí 'Completed' tab
üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí 'Cancelled' tab

üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí tap on a booking card

Returns full booking details including professional info, location, pricing, status.

üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí Upcoming ‚Üí 'Cancel' action

Customer can cancel a pending or confirmed booking.
üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí Reschedule action

body.raw:
{
  "bookingId": "{{bookingId}}",
  "professionalId": "{{professionalId}}",
  "rating": 5,
  "title": "Exceptional service!",
  "content": "The photography was absolutely stunning. Very professional and punctual."
}

request.description:
üì± Figma Screen: My Bookings ‚Üí Completed ‚Üí 'Rate & Review'

Role required: client

Can only submit review for a completed booking.

item.name: üîµ PROFESSIONAL FLOW
item.description:
Professional onboarding + dashboard APIs.

Flow:
1. User Selection (choose Professional)
2. Phone OTP verification for professional onboarding
3. Tell About Yourself
4. Build Profile
5. Legal & Identity
6. Pricing & Payment
7. Services & Portfolio
8. Submit and check approval status

request.description:
HOW TO START AS PROFESSIONAL:

1. Register/Login from SHARED AUTH and set token
2. Send professional phone OTP (STEP 1A below)
3. Verify professional phone OTP (STEP 1B below)
4. Start onboarding by POST /professionals
5. Continue remaining onboarding steps in order

Professional onboarding entry: send OTP to phone number before creating professional profile.

If OTP_PROVIDER_PHONE=firebase, pass recaptchaToken from client app.

Use provider=firebase.

For testing without Firebase billing/recaptcha, use provider=mock.

Verify professional phone OTP before starting onboarding endpoints.

Use provider=firebase.

item.name: STEP 1A-alt ‚Äî Send OTP (Professional Phone Verification Mock)

request.description:
Testing flow: force mock phone OTP when Firebase is not available. Response returns devOtp.

For testing without Firebase billing/recaptcha, use provider=mock.

item.name: STEP 1B-alt ‚Äî Verify OTP (Professional Phone Verification Mock)

request.description: Testing flow: verify mock phone OTP. Use the devOtp returned by Send OTP mock request.

item.name: ‚îÄ‚îÄ STEP 2: PERSONAL INFO (Figma: Tell About Yourself) ‚îÄ‚îÄ

request.description:
Tell About Yourself (starts professional profile creation after OTP verification).

After success: copy professional id to {{professionalId}}.

item.name: ‚îÄ‚îÄ STEP 3: PROFESSIONAL PROFILE (Figma: Build Your Profile) ‚îÄ‚îÄ

request.description:
üì± Figma Screen: 'Build Your Professional Profile' ‚Äî working days, location, equipment

Role required: professional

üì± Figma Screen: 'Legal & Identity Verification'

Fields: Aadhaar number, PAN number, GST (optional), document image URLs.

‚ö†Ô∏è Upload images first using the UPLOAD API, then pass the returned URL here.

üì± Figma Screen: 'Pricing & Payment Setup'

Set hourly rate, packages, and bank/UPI details for payouts.

body.raw:
{
  "type": "image",
  "url": "https://cdn.example.com/portfolio/wedding1.jpg",
  "thumbnailUrl": "https://cdn.example.com/portfolio/wedding1_thumb.jpg",
  "title": "Royal Wedding at Taj Hotel",
  "description": "Full day wedding coverage in Mumbai",
  "category": "wedding",
  "order": 1
}

request.description:
üì± Figma Screen: Portfolio management

type: 'image' | 'video'
category: 'wedding' | 'portrait' | 'corporate' | 'pre-wedding'
Remove a specific portfolio item by its ID.

üì± Figma Screen: 'Profile Submitted Successfully!' ‚Üí check approval status

Returns full professional profile including:
- status: pending | approved | rejected
- All onboarding fields

Poll this after submission to check if admin has approved.

query.description: Filter: pending | confirmed | completed | cancelled | rejected

request.description:
üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí My Bookings ‚Üí All tabs

Role required: professional

Remove status param to get all bookings.

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí 'Upcoming Bookings' widget

Role required: professional

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí Calendar

Returns booked/blocked dates for the month.

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí Pending Booking ‚Üí 'Confirm' button

Role required: professional

Changes booking status: pending ‚Üí confirmed

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí Pending Booking ‚Üí 'Reject' button

Role required: professional

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí Confirmed Booking ‚Üí 'Mark Complete'

Role required: professional

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí Edit Professional Information ‚Üí Contact

Role required: professional

üì± Figma Screen: Vendor Dashboard ‚Üí toggle active/inactive switch

Set isActive: false to go offline (won't appear in search).

Check if the API server is running.

Response: { success: true, message: 'API is running', timestamp, version }
